original: 張角病亡。於廣宗突襲斬張梁、再轉曲陽斬張寶。張角首級運回京師，暫時平定了黃巾起義亂局。
text: Zhang Jiao died of illness. Yu Guangzong raided and cut Zhang Liang, then turned to Quyang to cut Zhang Bao. Zhang Jiao was transported back to the capital at the first level, temporarily putting down the chaos of the Yellow Turban Uprising.
